author: nieldakarla
message: fix(Curriculum): Fix missing words of tasks in block 13 B1 English curriculum (#59717)

files.patch:
@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@ challengeType: 22
 dashedName: task-117
 ---
 
-<!-- (Audio) Brian: It save us time and resources. What about timelines? Which option is faster? -->
+<!-- (Audio) Brian: It could save us time and resources. What about timelines? Which option is faster? -->
 
 # --instructions--
 
@@ -15,7 +15,7 @@ Listen to the audio and complete the sentence below.
 
 ## --sentence--
 
-`It BLANK and resources. What about BLANK? Which option is faster?`
+`It could BLANK and resources. What about BLANK? Which option is faster?`
 
 ## --blanks--
 
@@ -63,7 +63,7 @@ This word in the plural form refers to schedules or deadlines for completing a p
     "audio": {
       "filename": "B1_13-3.mp3",
       "startTime": 1,
-      "startTimestamp": 32.54,
+      "startTimestamp": 32.34,
       "finishTimestamp": 37.52
     }
   },
@@ -76,16 +76,16 @@ This word in the plural form refers to schedules or deadlines for completing a p
     {
       "character": "Brian",
       "startTime": 1,
-      "finishTime": 5.98,
+      "finishTime": 6.18,
       "dialogue": {
-        "text": "It save us time and resources. What about timelines? Which option is faster?",
+        "text": "It could save us time and resources. What about timelines? Which option is faster?",
         "align": "center"
       }
     },
     {
       "character": "Brian",
       "opacity": 0,
-      "startTime": 6.48
+      "startTime": 6.68
     }
   ]
 }

@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@ challengeType: 19
 dashedName: task-118
 ---
 
-<!-- (Audio) Brian: That's true, but outsourcing might be more cost-effective. It save us time and resources. What about timelines? Which option is faster? -->
+<!-- (Audio) Brian: That's true, but outsourcing might be more cost-effective. It could save us time and resources. What about timelines? Which option is faster? -->
 
 # --instructions--
 
@@ -99,7 +99,7 @@ He asks about `timelines`, meaning he is concerned with how long each option wil
       "startTime": 4.96,
       "finishTime": 10.14,
       "dialogue": {
-        "text": "It save us time and resources. What about timelines? Which option is faster?",
+        "text": "It could save us time and resources. What about timelines? Which option is faster?",
         "align": "center"
       }
     },

@@ -29,7 +29,7 @@ Place the following phrases in the correct spot:
 
 `Sarah: Well, building in-house is probably the BLANK to maintain control over the project. We would have more flexibility, and we could ensure the quality is up to our standards.`  
 
-`Brian: That's true, but outsourcing might be more cost-effective. It save us time and resources. What about timelines? Which option is faster?`  
+`Brian: That's true, but outsourcing might be more cost-effective. It could save us time and resources. What about timelines? Which option is faster?`  
 
 `Sarah: Outsourcing is usually faster because the external team can focus solely on our project. Building in-house might BLANK because we have other tasks to handle. However, outsourcing can lead to communication issues, which might delay the project.`
